page.title: 04Shopping Survey '85- Darwen.
page.content: { 50}people interviewed using shops in {Blackburn Road.}Each answered{10 questions on{shopping habits. {98%}lived locally {62%}shopped for food daily {41%}bought most of their food locally {53%}bought food in Darwen Town Centre { 6%}shopped for food out of town {91%}used shops in Darwen Town Centre {25%}bought clothes locally {75%}bought clothes out of town {35%}bought electrical goods locally {65%}bought electrical goods elsewhere {85%}used a supermarket regularly {51%}thought local shops "very good" {33%}thought local shops "adequate" {16%}thought local shops "not v.good" {57%}used a hypermarket occasionally {98%}thought that local shops would only be used by local people{ { Survey undertaken 10 to 10.15pm on { a Friday ; most interviewees aged.
